... You know, at first I thought this could be a troll post, but after a moment of thinking, I can make some sense of it.

Star Guardian Fiddlesticks: Story: Once known as Sue (Hey, if you can think of a better name feel free to drop one), now fallen to the dark nightmare realm. Her spirit and familiar fused into a nightmarish reflection of a what a Star Guardian may become if they let their hope fall into despair.

Make it a legendary skin, a new voice consisting of a split personality. One crying out for help, and the other trying to feed on the despair of their victims.

Anyway, that be enough from this corpse... Y'all have a good one.
